name: Challenge #1: Learning how to drive.
description: Welcome to Autos! As an introduction to the game, your single objective in this challenge is to move the Vehicle to City “B”. Write your code in the side panel and press Start!.
helpText: The function <m c="global">init</m> gets executed automatically when you press the "Start" button;

Whenever a method, class or property is mentioned here, in the console or in the description, it will have a link to its full documentation, like this: class <c>Vehicle</c>, function <m c="global">init</m>;
You can move the single <c>Vehicle</c> from <c>City</c> A to <c>City</c> B by using the <c>Vehicle</c>'s method <m c="Vehicle">moveTo</m>;

victory.text: Deliver the single car to city "B"
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return vehicles[0].lastCity.id == 'B'; }

defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 10; }
